products.name: Ancient Grains
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Breakfasts,Cereals and potatoes,Cereals and their products,Breakfast cereals
products.labels: Organic,Vegetarian,Kosher,USDA Organic,Vegan,Canada Organic,Orthodox Union Kosher,Whole grain
products.facts: ["Ancient grains are whole grains that have remained largely unchanged over the last several hundred years, including varieties like quinoa, farro, and spelt.","They are often grown using sustainable farming practices, promoting biodiversity and soil health compared to conventional grains.","Ancient grains are typically higher in protein, fiber, and essential nutrients, making them a nutritious choice for a balanced diet.","Many ancient grains are naturally gluten-free, making them suitable for those with gluten sensitivities or celiac disease."]

products.name: Keto Nut Granola
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Seeds, Cereals and their products, Cereal grains
products.labels: No gluten, Crossed Grain Trademark, No GMOs, No added sugar
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality nuts and seeds, providing a rich source of healthy fats and protein.","Contains no added sugars or artificial sweeteners, making it a clean keto-friendly option.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Gluten-free and grain-free, catering to various dietary needs while maintaining quality ingredients."]

products.name: Special flakes original
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Flakes, Cereal flakes, Extruded cereals, Extruded flakes, Corn flakes, Mixed cereal flakes
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality, natural ingredients.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors.","Eco-friendly packaging that is recyclable.","Sourced from sustainable farming practices."]

products.name: Fancy Whole Cashews with Sea Salt
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Nuts and their products, Nuts, Cashew nuts, en:salted-nuts
products.facts: ["Fancy Whole Cashews are sourced from sustainable farms that prioritize eco-friendly practices.","The cashews are hand-picked to ensure only the highest quality nuts are selected for packaging.","Sea salt used is minimally processed, enhancing the natural flavor without compromising on health benefits.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, reducing environmental impact and promoting sustainability."]

products.name: Spaghetti no. 6
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Pastas, Spaghetti
products.facts: ["Made from durum wheat semolina, ensuring high quality and excellent cooking properties.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Produced using traditional methods to maintain authentic taste and texture.","Rich in protein and low in fat, making it a nutritious choice for meals."]

products.name: Original
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality, sustainable materials that are eco-friendly.","Packaging is recyclable, reducing environmental impact.","Products are designed for durability, ensuring long-lasting use.","Manufactured under strict quality control standards to ensure safety and performance."]

products.name: Organic Goodseed Thin-Sliced Bread
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Cereals and potatoes,Breads,Sliced breads,Multigrain sliced breads
products.facts: ["Made with organic whole grains and natural ingredients.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives.","Produced using environmentally sustainable practices.","Certified organic by the USDA, ensuring high quality and safety standards."]

products.name: Kefir plain low fat milk smoothie
products.categories: Beverages, Dairies, Fermented foods, Desserts, Fermented milk products, Dairy desserts, Dairy drinks, Fermented dairy desserts, Fermented drinks, Fermented milk drinks, Yogurts
products.labels: No gluten, Green Dot, No Bisphenol-A, en:certified-gluten-free
products.packaging: CONTAINS: MILK. ©2021 LIFEWAY FOODS, INC. MORTON GROVE, ILLINOIS 60053 LIFEWAYFOODS.COM @@ BARY GRADE A KEEP REFRIGERATED
products.facts: ["Kefir is made from fermented milk, containing live probiotics that promote gut health.","The packaging is often made from recyclable materials, reducing environmental impact.","Low fat content in Kefir helps maintain a balanced diet while providing essential nutrients.","Kefir production typically involves sustainable farming practices, supporting local agriculture."]

products.name: Iodized Salt
products.categories: Condiments, Salts, Iodised salts, Table salts, Groceries
products.facts: ["Iodized salt is regular table salt that has been fortified with iodine, an essential nutrient.","The addition of iodine to salt helps prevent iodine deficiency, which can lead to thyroid problems.","Iodized salt is produced using a process that ensures the iodine remains stable and effective over time.","The use of iodized salt has significantly improved public health, particularly in areas where natural iodine levels in food are low."]

products.name: Mini Madeleines
products.labels: en:Free range, Iz slobodnog uzgoja, Proizvedeno u Francuskoj, Bez bojila, Bez palminog ulja, Jaja EU
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality ingredients including butter, eggs, and flour.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Produced in a facility that adheres to strict quality control standards.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors, ensuring a natural taste."]

products.name: Old Fashioned Oats
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Breakfasts,Cereals and potatoes,Seeds,Cereals and their products,Breakfast cereals,Cereal grains,Flakes,Cereal flakes,Rolled flakes,Rolled oats
products.labels: Kosher, No GMOs, Non GMO project, Orthodox Union Kosher, 100% Whole Grain, American Heart Association Certified, en:no-artificial-flavors
products.facts: ["Old Fashioned Oats are made from whole oat groats that are steamed and rolled for a chewy texture.","They are a whole grain product, providing dietary fiber and essential nutrients for a healthy diet.","The production of oats generally has a lower environmental impact compared to other grains, requiring less water and fertilizer.","High-quality Old Fashioned Oats are non-GMO and often sourced from sustainable farming practices."]
